description:
A transfer student in the first grade of the Buou Private Academy`s Middle School section. "To believe in love and fight for love`s sake...", she seems to be a self-appointed Warrior of Love. However, her clumsiness stands out. Unaware of the plot from the chief secretary Matsudaira Takamori, she challenges Muneakira who was branded as a villain.
She can swing a large hammer bigger than her own height to fight and is a user of the "Naoe-style hammer fighting techniques", that despite how it looks, it`s an extremely bold fighting style.
She`s a childhood friend of Yukimura and they seem to have a very close connection.
name: Naoe Kanetsugu
